cards.title: Herroww? Hans?
cards.description: Our glorius leader [player1] has joined the group today. Being extremely gracefull in his presence [player2] and [player3] will bow before his greatness and give him one of their gifts
rules: [player1.name] will from now on be known as [player1.alt]
if [player2] and [player3] don't have any gifts they will be taken from the pile or stolen from the rich

cards.title: The pact
cards.description: [player1]'s soul is taken by the Devil himself... and in return is blessed with demonic powers. All players cower in fear and offer up one of their gifts to please their lord
rules: [player1.name] will from now on be known as [player1.alt]
if any player has no gift... [player1] laughs evilly at the pitty losers!

cards.title: Screw you.. I do what I want
cards.description: After watching 'Super Drags' on Netflix [player1] decides to become a drag queen... in support [player2] and [player3] offer it a gift
rules: [player1.name] will from now on be known as [player1.alt]
if [player2] or [player3] has no gifts, [player1] get's a gift from pile or the richest player]

cards.title: Miaaauuwww
cards.description:
In exchange for a poisoned apple a witch grants [player1] his biggest wish and turns him into a cat!

Using his new cat-skills he sneaks 2 gifts from the pile.
rules: [player1.name] will from now on be known as [player1.alt]
If there are no gifts in the pile... [player1] take one from the richest player

cards.title: Dumboooo
cards.description: After watching Dumbo on netflix [player1] uses the power of plastic surgery to change himself into an elephant!
rules: [player1.name] will from now on be known as [player1.alt]
[player1] is now able to fly! Really.. give it a try
[player1] takes 2 gifts from the pile
If there are no gifts in the pile... [player1] take one from the richest player

cards.title: The sock-monster
cards.description: After watching way to many episodes of the muppets [player1]'s hand get's possessed by a sock
rules: [player1.name] will from now on be known as [player1.alt]
[player1] is only allowed to talk using his sock
[player1] takes 3 gifts from the pile
If there are no gifts in the pile... [player1] take one from the richest player

cards.title: Yarrghhhh
cards.description: [player1] has decided to change his way of life and become a pirate! Yarghhh... He collect's some sweet booty from [player2], [player3] and [player4]
rules: [player1.name] will from now on be known as [player1.alt]
[player2], [player3] and [player4] lose a gift to [player1]
if any player has no gifts, [player1] makes them get food for all the other players

cards.title: Equivalent Exchange
cards.description:
Humankind cannot gain anything without first giving something in return. To obtain, something of equal value must be lost.

[player1] trades a gift with [player2]
rules: If either player has no gifts they will be taken from the pile or stolen from the rich

cards.title: You've been naughty...
cards.description: [player1] has been very naughty this year... santa takes one of your gifts
rules: Losts gifts are added to the pile
If [player1] has no gifts... well... I guess even santa feels bad for you

cards.title: Spooky ghost!
cards.description: [player1] encounters a 'spoooooky ghost' and gets covered in 'ectoplasm'... feeling bad he takes 1 gift from the pile
rules: [player1] explains to the group where all the white warm sticky stuff came from
If there are no gifts in the pile... [player1] take one from the richest player

cards.title: Robin Da Hood
cards.description: [player1] decides to stick it to the man! It's time to steal from the rich and give to... well not the poor, screw them... I'm doing all the hard work here!
rules: [player1] takes 2 gifts from the richest player
If [player1] is the richest player... don't whine.. you're rich!

cards.title: Demonic encounter!
cards.description:
[player1] got lost in the woods... in the deep dark forest a demon suddenly appears and offers to help you find your way back...

at the cost of 2 gifts though! muahaha
rules: [player1] loses 2 gifts
if [player1] has demonic powers... he/she gets 2 gifts instead
Losts gifts are added to the pile
If [player1] has no gifts... he/she gets drinks for everybody

cards.title: You've been nice...
cards.description: [player1] has been a good genderless being this year... the gods of gender-neutrality bless you with a gift.
rules: [player1] takes a gift from the pile
If there are no gifts in the pile... [player1] take one from the richest player

cards.title: This town ain't big enough
cards.description: Sheriff [player1] is in charge of this town... but bandit [player2] ain't playing kindly... It's time for a staredown at noon!
rules: both players put on a cowboy hat! Yeeee hawww
The players stare in eachothers eyes... the first to blink loses a gift to the other
put on some good/bad/ugly music for extra effect
if the loser has no gifts, the winner takes or steals one

cards.title: Rock, Paper, Shotgun
cards.description: [player1] challenges [player2] and [player3] to a game of rock/paper/scissors
rules: The winner takes 1 gift from the other players
if the loser has no gifts, the winner takes or steals one

cards.description: [player1]'s dream to be the best there's ever been is about to come true... Take out the dart board and show what you're made of
rules: the board is placed 2 meters away from the player
[player1] gets 3 throws to try and hit the middel row
if [player1] hits the middle row at least once he gets a gift
if [player1] is able to head the exact center he gets 2 gifts
If there are no gifts in the pile... [player1] take one from the richest player

cards.title: The dive
cards.description: [player1] takes [player2], [player3] and [player4] diving... unfortunatly he forgot to bring any equipment... but no worries, we can just hold our breaths!
rules: All players hold their breaths, the player who lasts longest wins!
The winner takes 1 gift from the other players
if any loser has no gifts... they must record their best fart impression and share it with the group!

cards.title: A day at the zoo
cards.description: [player1] tell's [player2] how amazing he is at making animal sounds... now it's time to prove it
rules: [player1] has 30 seconds to make as many different animal sounds as he can think of
[player2] has to guess the animals
if [player2] is able to guess at least 10 animals, both players get 2 gifts

cards.title: Winner takes all!
cards.description:
Luck is what happens. when preparation meets opportunity.

[player1] invites [player2] and [player3] for a game of dice... go big or go home
rules: [player1] choses up to 2 gifts to gamble... [player2] and [player3] must join
[player1] throws the dice
[player1] wins with a 1 or 2, [player2] wins with 3 or 4, [player3] wins with 5 or 6
The winner gets al the gifts!
if any player does not have enough gifts when they lose... they dance on a backstreet boys / spice girls song

cards.title: Luck of the draw!
cards.description: [player1] joins [player2], [player3] and [player4] for a game of chance at the casino...
rules: each player gambles 1 gift
[player1] throws the dice
if a 1 is thrown everybody loses their bets - gifts go back in the pile
if a 2 is thrown [player1] wins and gets all the gifts
if a 3 is thrown [player2] wins and gets all the gifts
if a 4 is thrown [player3] wins and gets all the gifts
if a 5 is thrown [player4] wins and gets all the gifts
if a 6 everybody wins! Players take a gift from the pile
if any player does not have enough gifts when they lose... get drinks for [player1]

cards.title: Swiper no swiping!
cards.description: [player1] swipes a gift away from [player2]
rules: If [player2] has no gifts, [player1] swipes one from the richest player - or the pile

cards.title: Apocalypse now
cards.description: [player1] accidentaly triggered the apocalypse... the earth is now doomed.. thank you [player1]!
rules: All players lose a gift
Everybody has to thank [player1] for triggering the apocalypse
